type: Regional Master Standing Offer for aggregates products
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of aggregates products including delivery for a sector located in Quebec
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Federal Departments and Agency, is issuing this Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the acquisition of aggregates products including delivery for a sector located in Quebec: South shore of Montreal - Farnham & St-Jean, as detailed in Annex A.
duration_in_months: All BIDs must be received by 14:00:00 on 2024-04-23
full_summary:
_____________________
**E6MON-230006-2 Regional Master Standing Offer for Aggregates Products** 
_____________________
[Government tender notice]

**Ref. Number: WS3723057358-Doc4508075867**

Publication Date: March 26, 2024
Closing Date: April 23, 2024, 14:00:00 hours
_____________________

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (DWP) invites prospective suppliers to submit bids for the acquisition of aggregates products, including delivery, for a sector located in Quebec. 

**Description:**
This notice is for a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) to procure aggregates products for a sector covering the South shore of Montreal. The suppliers are expected to deliver the products to the following regions:
- **Donnacona**
- **Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu**
- **Montréal**
- **Longueuil**
- **Farnham**
- **Québec**
- **Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines**

**Category and UNSPSC Code:** 
Aggregates
(UNS SUB CATEGORY CODE 30111800)

**Sourcing Method:**
Competitive - Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements:**
Suppliers can submit their bids if they are registered under any of the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contact Information:**
For all inquiries and additional information, please contact:
Annie Blanchet (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: [Not available]
Email: [annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
